bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu lei 虛羸 , depletion and thinness. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 39: 膏肓俞： 主無所不療，諸羸弱、瘦損、虛勞、夢中失精、上氣咳逆、狂惑妄誤 , “[To pierce] the gao huang transporter serves to cure every [ailment]: all types of thinness and weakness, emaciation detriment , depletion exhaustion, loss of semen while dreaming, cough with qi rising contrary to it normal course, madness and delusion, and deliberate lying “.
